TextBlock._LCLZText: Launches your model in Autodesk CFD.
Opens CFD and imports your model into a new file. Setup and run your CFD simulation using your verified geometry.
Launches your model in Autodesk Generative Design.
Opens Autodesk Generative Design and imports your model into a new Project. Setup and run your generative design study using the imported model.
Open in CFD Model Assessment Tool.
Opens Autodesk CFD and imports your model into the Assessment Tool before creating a new Design Study.
Launches your model in Autodesk Moldflow Adviser.
Opens Moldflow Adviser and imports your model into a new file. Setup and run your Moldflow simulation using your verified geometry.
Launches your model in Autodesk Moldflow Insight.
Opens Moldflow Synergy and imports your model into a new file. Setup and run your Moldflow simulation using your verified geometry.
